tickets.title: Cannot login to my account
tickets.description: I've been trying to log in to my account for the past 2 days but keep getting an error message saying 'Invalid credentials'.

tickets.title: Website is loading very slowly
tickets.description: The website takes more than 30 seconds to load on both my laptop and phone.

tickets.title: Request for feature enhancement
tickets.description: It would be great if you could add dark mode to the application.

tickets.title: Billing discrepancy on my last invoice
tickets.description: I was charged $55.99 but my plan should be $49.99 per month.

messages.content: I've tried resetting my password but still can't get in.
Hi John, have you tried clearing your browser cache? Sometimes stored cookies can cause login issues.
I just tried that but still having the same problem.
I've reset your account on our end. Please try logging in with the temporary password I've sent to your email.
That worked! Thank you so much for your help.
The slowdown seems to happen especially when I try to load images.
We're investigating this issue. Could you tell me which browser you're using?
I'm using Chrome version 118 on Windows 11.
Thanks for that information. We're optimizing our image delivery service which should resolve this issue. I'll keep you updated on our progress.

messages.ticket: Billing discrepancy on my last invoice
messages.content: Here's a screenshot of my invoice showing the incorrect amount.

messages.ticket: Billing discrepancy on my last invoice
messages.content: I've checked your account and you're right. The system didn't apply your loyalty discount. I'll process a refund for the difference right away.

messages.ticket: Billing discrepancy on my last invoice
messages.content: Thank you for handling this so quickly!

messages.ticket: Billing discrepancy on my last invoice
messages.content: The refund has been processed and should appear on your account within 3-5 business days. I've also made sure the correct price is applied to your future invoices.

feedback.comments: Jane was incredibly helpful and solved my problem quickly. Great service!

feedback.ticketTitle: Billing discrepancy on my last invoice
